page.title: 17LIFE-STYLES - CHILDREN 4
page.content: {STEPHEN JONES}10 yrs. "{MY HOBBY}is computing and collecting Action Force figures. I create my own computer games.I{HATE}going shopping with mum.I {LIKE}Art & Science and I am in{CUBS. " {AMANDA GILL}9 yrs."My hair is brown & I have a rats tail,a few strands of long hair hanging down. {MY FAVOURITE {FOOD}is roast lamb. MY{HOBBY}is horse riding. Being nice pleases me." {ALEXANDER EASTON}-10 yrs."{I ENJOY} Science and astronomy an awful lot. I enjoy visiting museums & seeing dinosaurs. {I DISLIKE}a no work day. Number fascinates me & I got a calculator on my 3rd birthday. {MELANIE JAYNE LITTLEWOOD}9yrs ."I { {LIKE}school holidays because there are ice-creamse, chips, scampi & best of all things to buy.{MY HOBBIES} are horse riding & playing the piano. I have a {PET}rabbit, dog & pony."
